name: Miska Kaipiainen
description: From networking ships, it was inevitable that Miska would found Kontena: the most user friendly open source container platform for orchestrating applications running on Docker.

name: Murat Multu
description: Murat co-founded Marvel in the summer of 2013 as a simple way for designers to showcase interactive prototypes instead of lifeless, static mockups. Since then the vision has grown and now Marvel has its sights set on helping the world bring digital ideas to life.

name: Andrius Šlimas
description: Having worked in e-commerce for years, Andrius, his brother Tomas, and co-founders are democratising drop-shipping for online store-owners all over the world.

name: Christopher Kahler
description: Chris and his team have always built companies that give superpowers to normal humans. At Qriously, they are working on predicting the future by serving questions to billions of people all over the world on their smartphones.

name: Eduardo Vilar
description: Eduardo founded Returnly in 2014 from a vision of a radically improved online marketplace where all constituents have aligned interests. He's leveraging modern fin-tech to enable stores with simple and transparent ways of processing returns and accelerate the resulting credit issuance to shoppers.

name: Carlo Gualandri
description: Carlo has successfully built and sold a number of companies in over 20 years of entrepreneurism. Now he's turned his attention to banking, with a passion to fundamentally change how people manage their money.

name: Navid Razazi
description: Navid is the founder and CEO of YouPic. At the age of 15 he created his first website and is now growing YouPic to be the destination for photographers that want to learn and inspire.

name: Aaron Joyce
description: Aaron co-founded Aibl, the self-learning solution for recurring revenue driven companies. Aibl predicts when customers are going to leave and why. Companies can create custom messages and on-boarding flows based on each of their users’ predicted behaviour.

name: István Csanády
description: István has been a massive CAD nerd for years. Finally he decided 'enough is enough' and built his own. Shapr3D is a new way of thinking and designing, and has become one of the flagship iPad Pro apps.
